title: ORB and masterwork chest can't be open!!!!
body: Anyone has the same issue? There is no image when I left click the ORB and masterwork chest, unlike the normal chest.

replies.body: Yeah, I just recently used RP to buy 2 of each and I can't open them either. I've closed the game, restarted my computer and it hasn't helped.
i am having the same problem :(
Changing my client to low spec mode helped. Try it, hope it works for you.
